messages.title: THE TORIES HAVE:
messages.content: Caused the worst A&E crisis on record, Trebled tuition fees, Given millionaires a tax break while working people pay more, Left working people £1,600 worse off due to rising prices and stagnant wages, Broken their promise to cut net migration

messages.title: LABOUR HAS A BETTER PLAN:
messages.content: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, Reduce tuition fees to £6,000 and increase student grants by £400, Clamp down on tax avoidance and abolish non-dom status, Raise the minimum wage to £8, Stop people who come here from claiming benefits for two years

messages.title: We will cut the deficit every year.
messages.content: None of our manifesto commitments require extra borrowing.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs
Reduce tuition fees to £6,000 and increase student grants by £400
Clamp down on tax avoidance and abolish non-dom status
Raise the minimum wage to £8, Stop people who come here from claiming benefits for two years.
Cut the deficit every year without additional borrowing.

issues.economy: Raise the minimum wage to £8, Stop people who come here from claiming benefits for two years
issues.education: Reduce tuition fees to £6,000 and increase student grants by £400
issues.governance: Clamp down on tax avoidance and abolish non-dom status
issues.health: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs
issues.immigration: Stop people who come here from claiming benefits for two years

images.caption: Labour campaign leaflet snippet discussing policies and criticizing opposing party.
